_header: A lesson of mercy and forgiveness
Subjects: sermons, verse in; advice, moral; sin; mercy
_description: Verses about lessons to be learned to withstand sin, in a Latin sermon — two couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
A lesson of mercy and forȝyfnesseof loue & of
                    mekenesseto wytstond synne wyt al ouyr myȝthþat men schuld
                    loue pes & ryȝth
